item.title: 阿布扎比出售美元债券重返债市
item.description: 阿布扎比正在出售美元债券，这是其一年多来首次发行债券。【原文：Abu Dhabi is selling dollar-denominated bonds, its first debt issuance in over a year.】

item.title: Finma 称瑞银紧急计划不可执行
item.description: 瑞士金融监管机构 Finma 周四表示，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）制定的应急计划目前还不够充分。【原文：The plans prepared by UBS Group AG for what to do in an emergency are currently insufficient, the Swiss financial watchdog Finma said Thursday.】

item.title: 政治不确定性持续存在，法国消费者阴霾不散
item.description: 法国消费者信心在 9 月份依然疲软，反映出在不到一年的时间里政府第二次垮台后不确定性加剧。【原文：French consumer confidence remained weak in September, reflecting heightened uncertainty after a second government collapse in less than a year.】

item.title: 高盛旗下彼得希尔公司计划退还资本并从伦敦证券交易所退市
item.description: 高盛集团支持的 Petershill Partners Plc 公司计划向投资者返还资本，并从伦敦证券交易所退市，这是英国濒临破产的资本市场和投资信托行业遭受的最新打击。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.-backed Petershill Partners Plc plans to return capital to investors and delist from the London Stock Exchange, the latest blow to the UK’s ailing capital markets and investment trust industry.】

item.title: 欧盟官员塞夫科维奇寻求尽快与马来西亚和其他东盟国家签订自由贸易协定
item.description: 欧盟贸易负责人马罗斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）表示，欧盟希望在 2027 年欧盟-东盟关系 50 周年纪念之前，与马来西亚和东南亚国家联盟的另外两个成员国达成自由贸易协定。【原文：European Union trade chief Maros Sefcovic said the bloc hopes to reach free trade agreements with Malaysia and two other members of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations before the 50th anniversary of EU-Asean relations in 2027.】

item.title: 以太币创下七周新低，加密货币继续回落
item.description: 以太币跌破 4000 美元，创下近七周以来的最低水平，扩大了更广泛的数字资产溃败，自本周开始以来，市值已被抹去 1400 多亿美元。【原文：Ether slid below $4,000 to its lowest level in nearly seven weeks, extending a broader digital-asset rout that’s erased more than $140 billion in market value since the start of the week.】

item.title: 阿曼去年在伦敦首次公开募股中名列前茅后，将目光投向旅游业和科技行业
item.description: 马斯喀特证券交易所正准备在 2026 年进行多达三次首次公开募股，作为促进上市和争取升级为新兴市场的更广泛战略的一部分。【原文：The Muscat Stock Exchange is preparing for as many as three initial public offerings in 2026 as part of a broader strategy to boost listings and chase an upgrade to emerging market status.】

item.title: 新加坡 2025 年第二大上市项目中，Centurion 的房地产投资信托分拆收益达 11
item.description: 新加坡本年度第二大股票上市活动一鸣惊人，使该城市国家的首次股票销售收入创下六年来的新高。【原文：Singapore’s second-largest stock listing of the year debuted with a bang, bringing the city-state’s proceeds from first-time share sales to a six-year high.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲在稳定币方面有落后于美国的风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲银行在稳定币的快速发展方面有可能落后于美国，从而有可能损害欧洲大陆的主权。【原文：European banks risk falling behind the US in the rapid development of stablecoins, potentially undermining the continent’s sovereignty, European Central Bank Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 股票大涨吸引投资者离场，中国债券跌势加深
item.description: 中国政府债券加速下跌，长期债券收益率达到今年以来的最高水平，投资者在国内市场休市一周前纷纷涌入股市。【原文：Declines in Chinese government bonds are accelerating and yields on long-term notes are at the highest levels this year, as investors pile into stocks before onshore markets take a weeklong break.】

item.title: 新加坡警告内容创作者不要提供金融建议
item.description: 新加坡监管机构将向五名可能无证提供金融建议的内容创作者发出咨询函，与其他国家的监管机构一道加强对社交媒体影响者的监督。【原文：Singapore’s regulator will issue advisory letters to five content creators who may have given financial advice without a license, joining authorities elsewhere in tightening oversight of social media influencers.】

item.title: 直播：富时 100 指数在矿工推动的反弹后将出现回调
英国预算焦虑影响金边债券拍卖，投资者胃口减退
item.description: 随着对 11 月份预算案的财政担忧加剧，英国金边债券市场的不安情绪开始影响政府拍卖的需求。【原文：The UK’s gilt market jitters are starting to impact demand at government auctions as fiscal concerns grow ahead of the budget in November.】

item.title: 中国科技股延续涨势，有望创下连胜纪录
item.description: 受投资者对中国人工智能开发商持续热情的推动，中国科技股周四延续涨势。【原文：Chinese tech stocks extended their rally Thursday, fueled by persistent investor enthusiasm for the country’s artificial intelligence developers.】

item.title: 首尔公寓价格连续第 34 周上涨，步伐加快
item.description: 尽管政府采取了旨在降温房价的措施，但韩国房地产市场的涨势仍在加快，这使得央行降低借贷成本以帮助经济的理由变得更加复杂。【原文：South Korea’s property market extended its rally to a 34th week as the pace of gains accelerated despite government steps meant to cool prices, complicating the central bank’s case to lower borrowing costs to aid the economy.】

item.title: 自由港矿难可能导致与印尼关系破裂
item.description: 印尼格拉斯贝格铜矿的停产似乎将使矿商自由港麦克莫兰公司（Freeport-McMoran Inc.【原文：A halt in production at the giant Grasberg copper mine in Indonesia looks set to strain the fractious relationship between miner Freeport-McMoran Inc. and its host nation, at a time when the Jakarta government was already looking to take greater control.】

item.title: 波兰成为绕开中国的台湾无人机最大进口国
item.description: 波兰已成为台湾无人机的最大买家，因为这个位于俄罗斯家门口的东欧国家正在加强其国防能力，并寻求减少对中国零部件的依赖。【原文：Poland has become the biggest buyer of drones from Taiwan as the Eastern European country, on Russia’s doorstep, bolsters its defense capabilities and seeks to reduce reliance on Chinese parts.】

item.title: CATL 大涨超越茅台成为中国第三大股票
item.description: 当代安培科技股份有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.由于强劲的电池需求前景提振了投资者的情绪，安培瑞斯科技股份有限公司超越白酒生产商贵州茅台酒股份有限公司，成为中国市值第三大的本地上市股票。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. overtook liquor maker Kweichow Moutai Co. to become China’s third largest locally listed stock by market value as strong outlook for battery demand boosted investor sentiment.】

item.title: 苹果公司要求欧盟废除全面的大型科技公司反垄断规则
item.description: 苹果公司要求欧盟反垄断监督机构废除旨在保护数字消费者的法规，认为这些法规使用户面临隐私风险，并有可能破坏创新。【原文：Apple Inc. has asked European Union antitrust watchdogs to scrap regulations intended to protect digital consumers, arguing they expose users to privacy risks and threaten to undermine innovation.】

item.title: 关于顶级加密货币交易所收购的报道引发 Naver 股价大涨
item.description: 有报道称，Naver 公司的金融科技部门正在寻求收购韩国最大的加密货币交易所的运营商，随后该公司股价一度大涨 11%。【原文：Naver Corp. shares jumped as much as 11% after a report that the company’s fintech unit is pursuing a takeover of the operator of South Korea’s biggest crypto exchange.】

item.title: 英国石油公司与 L&G 公司达成 16 亿英镑的养老金风险转移协议
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）已将其在英国的部分养老金转移给一家保险公司，这是英国一家大型公司为卸下与退休支付相关的风险而采取的最新举措。【原文：BP Plc has transferred a portion of its UK pension pot to an insurer, the latest move by a major British company to offload risks related to retirement payments.】

item.title: 继承人的急躁情绪如何助长了老年人的财务虐待行为
item.description:
本周彭博澳大利亚播客：无耐心继承的兴起让更多退休人员损失了大笔养老金储蓄。【原文：

This week on the Bloomberg Australia Podcast: The rise of inheritance impatience is costing more retirees large chunks of their superannuation savings.

】

item.title: 日本 40 年期债务销售需求低于 12 个月平均水平
item.description: 日本 40 年期国债拍卖的需求率高于 12 个月的平均水平，缓解了市场对超长期限债务的担忧，尽管在日本执政党领导层竞选之前国内政治仍存在不确定性。【原文：Japan’s 40-year government bond auction drew a demand ratio that was stronger than its 12-month average, easing concerns about super-long debt despite domestic political uncertainties ahead of Japan’s ruling party leadership race.】

item.title: 台湾两天后暂停南非芯片出口禁令
item.description: 台湾正在暂停两天前刚刚对南非实施的芯片出口管制；这表明台湾对在外交争端中使用关键技术出口作为武器感到不安。【原文：Taiwan is suspending chip export controls it placed on South Africa just two days ago — a sign it is uncomfortable with using the key tech export as a weapon in diplomatic disputes.】

item.title: 印尼债券流出量将创三年来最差月份
item.description: 由于对印尼财政前景的担忧加剧，本月外国抛售印尼债券的规模将达到三年来最大。【原文：Foreign selling of Indonesian bonds this month is set for the largest in three years as worries over the nation’s fiscal outlook mount.】

item.title: 国泰就 "大额 "喷气机订单与股东谈判
item.description: 国泰航空公司（Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd.）首席执行官林荣辉表示，该公司正与股东商谈在未来十年再订购一架 "大型 "新飞机的事宜。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. is in talks with shareholders on making another “substantial” order for new aircraft for the next decade, Chief Executive Officer Ronald Lam said.】

item.title: 香港将推广离岸人民币债券，收益率曲线
item.description: 香港正在努力扩大离岸人民币债券作为抵押品的使用范围，同时为这种债务制定基于市场的收益率曲线，从而加强香港在开放中国资本市场方面的作用。【原文：Hong Kong is working on expanding the use of offshore yuan bonds as collateral while developing a market-based yield curve for the debt, reinforcing the city’s role in opening up China’s capital markets.】

item.title: 中国采购阿根廷大豆增至 35 船
item.description: 在南美国家暂停征收出口税之后，中国本周加大了从阿根廷购买大豆的力度，这使得通常在每年这个时候主导大豆贸易的美国农民靠边站了。【原文：China ramped up buying of soybeans from Argentina this week after the South American country suspended export taxes, sidelining US farmers who usually dominate the trade at this point of the year.】

item.title: 恒天然预计新西兰奶农将在创纪录的派息后消费
item.description: 恒天然合作社集团主席彼得-麦克布莱德（Peter McBride）表示，在创纪录的牛奶付款之后，新西兰奶农将重新开始消费，这对新西兰疲软的经济将是一个可喜的推动。【原文：New Zealand dairy farmers are set to start spending again after a record milk payment, Fonterra Cooperative Group Chair Peter McBride said, in what would be a welcome boost for the nation’s sluggish economy.】
